text: DYME (783 kHz) Radyo Masbate is an AM station owned by Masbate Community Broadcasting Company. Its studios & transmitter are located at DYME Bldg., Zurbito St., Brgy. Pating, Masbate City.2015 ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REPORT | NTC Region 8Tabloid columnist shot dead in MasbateRebel nabbed for 2003 slay of Masbate broadcasterFarmers abducted and later found dead in Mobo, Masbate, Philippines ==References== Category:News and talk radio stations in the Philippines Category:Radio stations established in 1979
title: DYME-AM
